## Multiselect.setupInput() method

The setup function for the input element of the multiselect.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        this: Multiselect,
        inputEl: HTMLDivElement,
        initializer: (value: string, shouldFocus?: boolean) => unknown
    ): void;
```
